Living & Loving In Jesus Christ

Learning to live and love in Jesus as we follow him together.

Our Vision

God the Father being glorified as His Kingdom advances in our city, nation and globally. Key Verse: Acts 1:8

Our Strategy

Make disciples that multiply, obey Jesus, and build strong families Key Verse: Mthw 28:18-20

Our Approach

Inviting and challenging in the Holy Spirit, in grace and truth, overtime. Key Verse: Lk 13:6-9
